main_definition: Deaf refers to a person who has little or no hearing ability, either completely (totally deaf) or partially (partially deaf). It can also be used as an idiom meaning that someone is not paying attention or refusing to listen.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having little or no hearing ability
meanings_and_examples.example: John was born completely deaf and communicates using sign language.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Refusing to listen or pay attention
meanings_and_examples.example: She told him not to 'deaf' his opinions, implying that she didn't want to consider what he had to say.
